
# Foundations owned folders
/.github/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Analytics/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Authentication/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Core/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Frameworks/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/HTTP/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/HTTPStubbing/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Persistence/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Shared/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/TestingUtilities/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/FeatureAppKit/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Tools/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/UI/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/bin/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/danger/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/fastlane/ @Gousto/iOS-Foundations

# Foundations owned files
/Cartfile.* @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/.Dependencies.lock @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Gemfile @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Brewfile @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/.swiftlint.yml @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/.git* @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/environment @Gousto/iOS-Foundations

# New trackers should be run via Foundations
/Shared/Sources/Extensions/Analytics+Platform.swift @Gousto/iOS-Foundations
/Gousto/Sources/Analytics/Trackers/MulticastTracker.swift @Gousto/iOS-Foundations

# Haricots owned files
/Account/ @Gousto/iOS-Haricots
/CustomerManagement/ @Gousto/iOS-Haricots
/Help/ @Gousto/iOS-Haricots

# Turnips owned files
